missing_evidence: Check for forensic reports (fingerprints, DNA analysis, blood spatter analysis).
Obtain statements from neighbors and nearby residents.
Collect phone records and call logs if applicable.
Limited time coverage. Consider collecting evidence from extended time periods before and after the incident.
Verify alibis and cross-check with CCTV timestamps.

extracted_content.extracted_text:
FIRST INFORMATION REPORT (FIR)

Police Station: Shivaji Nagar Police Station, Pune
FIR No: 118/2025
Date: 14 March 2025
Time: 08:45 PM

Complainant:
Name: Rohan Kulkarni
Age: 29
Address: Flat 203, Sai Apartment, FC Road, Pune

Accused:
Name: Akash Verma
Age: 28
Occupation: Delivery Boy
Address: 12/A, Modern Colony, Pune

Incident Description:
A First Information Report was registered at Shivaji Nagar Police Station, Pune, under FIR No. 118/2025 on 14 March 2025 at 08:45 PM. According to the FIR, the complainant Rohan Kulkarni stated that the accused Akash Verma confronted him near the main gate of Sai Apartment regarding a payment dispute. The argument quickly escalated, and Akash allegedly attacked Rohan using a small knife, causing an injury to his left arm.

Witnesses:
1) Priya Sharma ‚Äì Neighbor (2nd Floor)
2) Security Guard ‚Äì Sai Apartment

Sections Applied:
IPC 324 ‚Äì Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons
IPC 504 ‚Äì Intentional insult with intent to provoke breach of peace

Action Taken:
Knife recovered from scene. Medical examination completed. Accused detained.

extracted_content.extracted_text:
CITYCARE HOSPITAL ‚Äì INJURY REPORT

Case Ref: CR-5541/2025
Patient: Rohan Kulkarni
Age: 29
Date: 14 March 2025
Time: 20:30 PM

Injuries Observed:
- 3 cm deep cut wound on left arm (forearm region)
- Moderate bleeding controlled
- No fractures or major vascular damage
- Wound consistent with sharp pointed object (knife)

Doctor Comments:
The medical examination of Rohan Kulkarni was carried out at CityCare Hospital, Pune, on 14 March 2025 following the reported assault. The doctor noted a 3 cm deep cut wound on Rohan's left arm, consistent with an injury caused by a sharp pointed object, most likely a knife. The bleeding was described as moderate, and no fractures or major damage to blood vessels were observed. The report confirmed that the injury was consistent with an assault occurring at the time stated in the FIR and CCTV records.

Treatment: 5 stitches, antibiotics, tetanus injection

extracted_content.extracted_text:
WITNESS STATEMENT

Name: Priya Sharma
Age: 32
Address: Flat 205, 2nd Floor, Sai Apartment, FC Road, Pune
Date: 14 March 2025
Time: 21:30 PM

Statement:
A witness, Priya Sharma, aged 32, who resides on the 2nd floor of Sai Apartment, reported that she heard loud arguing at approximately 8 PM on 14 March 2025. When she went to her balcony to check the situation, she saw Akash Verma pushing Rohan Kulkarni near the gate. She observed Akash taking out a small object from his pocket, after which Rohan shouted in pain. Priya stated that the security guard immediately ran toward the two men upon hearing the commotion. Her statement aligns with both the CCTV footage and the medical injury report.

Additional Details:
- Akash wearing red shirt, black trousers
- Rohan wearing white t-shirt, blue jeans
- Incident lasted approximately 2-3 minutes
- Security guard arrived within 30 seconds

Witness Signature: ____________________
